title: Line Of Defense Tactics-LORD
description:
::::::::: LORD PRESENTS ::::::::::


:::: Line Of Defense Tactics-LORD ::::


::GENERAL INFORMATION::


Year: 2014 
Genre: Action, Indie, RPG, Strategy
Developer: 3000AD  
Publisher: 3000AD 
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip] 
Language: English 
Language: English 
Tablet: enclosing (ALI213 Steam Emu)


::DESCRIPTION::


Line Of Defense Tactics is a real-time strategy combat game for a range of 
mobile devices, laptops and desktops. The game is based on the world of the 
Line Of Defense MMO in which players command a team of four Galactic Command 
(GALCOM) marines in highly classified missions which take place in space and 
on planets.


::SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS::


OS: Windows 7 SP1 
Processor: Dual Core 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: DirectX compliant with 2GB memory 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Hard Drive: 500 MB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX compliant


::Download and Play::


::Greetz and Respect::


ALL CREDIT Goes to ALI213 for Ripping and Special friend for Distribution.
